sections.content:
Question:
Do all packages support an operating ambient temperature of 125°C?
Answer:
25-WFLGA, 32-LQFP, 44-LQFP, 48-HWQFN, 64-LQFP, 64-LFQFP do not support 125°C operating ambient temperature. If you need 125°C support, please select from packages other than those listed above.
Suitable Products
RL78/G24
